Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative.connectorgroup

Interface ConnectorGroupDefinition

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectorGroupBase, DefaultConnectorGroup
public interface ConnectorGroupDefinition
Interface defining a connector group.

A connector group combines a set of connectors which are part of one logical unit, such as an external system, or multiple external systems forming one unit.

If an InboundConnector and an OutboundConnector belong to the same connector group and are linked to the same IntegrationScenario, the outbound connector is (in the default configuration) ignored when receiving an integration call from the same groups inbound connector.

Adapter developers should not implement this interface directly, but extend ConnectorGroupBase instead.

See Also:
